name: Bonus Actions
flavor: Some things simply don't take as long as using an attack.
text:
- You have one Bonus Action per round, usable for consumables that aren't targeted on others (e.g., eating a berry or using a type gem to boost a move), or for swapping your actively 'Held' item with one in your bag.
- Using a held berry still uses the Bonus Action of your next turn
- Blast Seed is an exception, requiring a full action to consume due to its spiciness
